title: Public Holidays (Declaration) Notice, 2016
content:
Supplement to the Republic of Zambia Government 827
Gazette dated Friday,9th September, 2016
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO. 66 OF 2016
The Public Holidays Act
(Laws, Volume 15, Cap. 272)
The Public Holidys (Declaration) Notice 2016
IN EXERCISE of the powers contained in sections three of the
Public Holidays Act, The following Notice is issued:
1. This Notice may be cited as the Public Holidays Title
(Declaration) Notice , 2016.
2. It is declared that Tuesday, 13th September, 2016 shall be Declaration
observed as a public holiday in view of the swearing-in ceremony of public
holiday
of the President-elect and the Vice-President-elect to be held on
that day.
E. C. LUNGU,
LUSAKA President
9th September, 2016
[CO/101/9/1]
Copies of this Statutory Instrument can be obtained from the Government Printer,
P.O.Box 30136, 10101 Lusaka Price K4.00 each
828 Statutory Instruments 9th Septembeer, 2016
